desc.title: Description
desc.desc: The ESI Library was established when the school was created in 1969. It offers a wide range of services to users, mainly documentation. It is primarily specialized in the field of Computer Science.

workTimes.title: Opening Hours
workTimes.sunday: Sunday to Thursday: 8:30 AM to 10:00 PM

aquisation.title: Latest Acquisitions
aquisation.desc: Every year, the library purchases new books according to the needs of the members, especially the needs of the teachers (an average of 40 to 60 titles consisting of 3 to 5 copies each).

biblioInPic.title: Library in Pictures
biblioInPic.explore: Explore the gallery of our Library

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: Our team is here to answer all your questions and provide the assistance you need. Do not hesitate to contact us by email or in person at the library
